Posts.Content: Apr 23, 2013 11:02PM SLKsMom wrote: Quick, weird question: has anyone had their underarm hair to not grow back? I'm 7.5 months PFC and my hair, leg hair, and other areas are growing as normal. But, I literally have no underarm growth. Not complaining, but just find it odd. I didn't have radiation, only chemo. Anyone else experience this?

Posts.Content: Jan 5, 2013 10:14PM SLKsMom wrote: KristinFro. . . I found a product at Walgreen's. It's called FX Molding Wax, Pliable Hair Wax. It's in a grey jar with a green lid. It works better for me than Got2B Glued. It actually leaves a softer feel and lasts all day. Shannon

Posts.Content: Sep 22, 2012 10:13AM SLKsMom wrote: Hi, everyone . . I'm new to this thread. I am a little past 2 weeks PFC. Thursday will be 3 weeks. Right now my hair is "prickly" at best. It's very light and appears as slight peach fuzz when I get it at the right light and angle in the mirror. :-) My question is: when will that obvious growth spurt start? I'm taking biotin and using Nioxin. All so weird since before bc, I had the hair that all my friends and family envied. Long, thick, and easily maintained. Never fully colored it - but did highlight twice a year. It was definitely my identity. Oh, to be normal again. :) Thank you! Shannon
